summary: All four requested UI polish items appear to be implemented: task dialogs are set to opaque backgrounds in light/dark mode, “(optional)” wording is removed via i18n strings in tasks/overtime, branding shows only the i18n-driven app title “FitGebit” in header and login, and the avatar picker now renders avatars via an SVG-to-data-URI image component with an i18n empty state. However, the diff also includes changes that were not requested (notably role selection/manager token flow on the login screen, and multiple broader functional changes referenced in the file summaries).

hallucinated_features.description: Login screen adds role selection (Assistant/Manager) UI and stores pending role/token in sessionStorage as part of login flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to simplify branding text on the login screen (show only “FitGebit”) and did not request any new/changed authentication/role flows (explicit non-goal).

hallucinated_features.description: Broader product/feature changes unrelated to UI polish, including: overtime hooks returning empty data due to backend removal; task sorting/type priority changes; recurring task reset on mount; manager stats/audit log/CSV export changes; and other behavior changes listed across tasks/manager/overtime components.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not part of REQ-28..REQ-31 and conflict with the BuildRequest non-goals (no business-logic changes) and constraint that backend/migrations are not expected for UI-only changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces/keeps an app subtitle translation key (app.subtitle: "Dental Practice Management").
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-30 requested removing extra branding text such as subtitles from header/login rendering; while the UI may no longer render it, keeping/updating subtitle content was not requested and may be unnecessary scope.
